title: svAmi mukhya prANa nI
sahitya:
svAmi mukhya prANa nI malevara gaNDala gANa sakala vidyA pravINa nI hiDidyO rAma a caraNa


caraNam 1    sanjIvini parvatavannu anjade tandeyO nInu anjane tanu sambhavanu ninna bEDi kombEnO nAnu
    caraNam 2    vaikuNTha sthaLadinda bandu pampA kSEtradi nindu yantrOddhArakanendu purandara viTTalane sahanendu
